Apartament z calkowitym wyposarzeniem ,czysty i bardzo przyjemnie urzadzony. Bezproblemowy kontakt z wlascicielami, Zamowiony i zaplacony byl 1 pokojowy Apartament jednak wlasciciel poinformowal nas iz bez zadnej doplaty mozemy  skorzystac z apartamentu 2-pokojowego. Mimo opuznienia i przyjazdu dopiero po 23.00 nie bylo problemu z odebraniem kluczy. Wlasciciel pomyslal nawet o zarezerwowaniu parkingu dla nas i postawil wlasny samochod abysmy mieli wolne miejsce!! Naprawde bardzo polecam. My osobiscie napewno  bedziemy czesciej korzystac z tego apartamentu :) Acha... zapomnialam dodac ze pod choinka czekaly na nas rowniez prezenty! Jeszcze raz dziekujemy bardzo wlasciciela.
review.negative: Nie mam absolutnie nic do zarzucenia.

review.positive: Bardzo przyjemna atmosfera

Super lokalizacja. Miejsce parkingowe mozna bylo znalezc bez wiekszego problemu. Cisza i spokoj. Samo mieszkanko bardzo przytulne, super wyposazone bijace na glowe hotele 3* oraz 4*. W lazience markowe: mydlo, zel pod prysznic, szampon do wlosow, odzywka do wlosow, patyczki do uszu, waciki do demakijazu, suszarka i wiele innych. W przedpokoju znajdziemy m. in. odkurzacz, szczotki i gabeczki do czyszczenia butow i wiele wiecej. W kuchni jest chyba wszystko czego mozna tylko potrzebowac i jeszcze byc przy tym zaskoczonym. Mnie osobiscie zaskoczyl oldschool'owy toster z ktorego az chcialo sie skorzystac i tez to uczynilismy. Bardzo fajne ogolne wrazenia. Bezposredniego kontaktu z gospodarzami chyba nie mialem, ale obie Panie bardzo mile i caly proces odbierania i oddawania kluczy super szybki i bezproblemowy. Chce sie wspierac takie osoby i korzystac z ich uslug bo to naprawde sama przyjemnosc. TV posiada wejscie usb (wiec mozna obejzec swoje filmy czy tez posluchac swojej muzyki). Okna posiadaja moskitiery co jest super (chociaz niestety sa dziurawe przy rogach)
review.negative: Mysle i mysle i naprawde ciezko sobie cokolwiek przypomniec, ale z tego co pamietam naprawde nie bylo takiej rzeczy... Tak, jestem pewien, ze nic nie bylo. Nie mozna sie totalnie do niczego przyczepic, a jestem naprawde wymagajaca osoba. Dziekujemy~!!

review.positive:
The appartment is a one bed studio, small but well equipped. Good for 2 people or a small family of 3.  All that you might need was there...even small stuff as Q-tips and cosmetic cottons were provided. The owner was fluent in English and very communicable (answers to messages very fast.) also he is very kind and helpful and made sure that we had everything we need for our staying. The room was so clean that everythung smells good and were shiny. The owner tried a little extra on everything, complimentary candy, tea, cold beverages in the fridge. Very warmhearted.
Will love to stay there again if we visit Lodz again.
review.negative: If there was a washing machine, would have been perfect. And, there was only one bath robe in the shower. (We didn't want to bother the owner, so didnt ask for it)

review.positive: Jest to juz drugi nasz pobyt w apartamencie i z pewnoscia nie ostatni. Mieszkanie jest pieknie, funkcjonalnie urzadzone, sterylnie czyste - mozna sie poczuc jak w domu, a nawet lepiej. Znajdziemy tam wszystkie potrzebne sprzety, i produkty, lacznie z ekspresem do kawy, zapasem kasy i herbat czy pelnym zestawem kosmetykow w lazience. Dodatkowy, wielki plus dla podrozujacych z dziecmi - na zyczenie dostepne jest lozeczko, wanienka i krzeselko do karmienia dziecka. Wlasciciele zadbali nawet o zabawki :) Kontakt z wlascicielami wzorowy; widac ze w ten biznes wkladaja naprawde duzo zaangazowania i serca. I jeszcze okolica - bardzo zielona, w poblizu piekny park Mickiewicza oraz mniejsze zielone skwerki. Mozliwosc bezproblemowego parkowania pod budynkiem, a przy tym dogodny dojazd komunikacja miejska do centrum miasta. W okolicy dostepne sklepy spozywcze, apteka, pizzeria, place zabaw dla dzieci.

review.positive: The apartment is super clean, looks newly renovated, still fresh. The host is super caring, attentive, helpful and speaks quite good english which is usually never the case in Poland and not in a big city. The kitchen has everything you need, the wifi works, you have coffee, tea and a nice cold bubbly water on arrival. For the price you pay this is a ridiculously good value deal!
review.negative: The noise from the street, trash collecting machine and people chatting starts very very early. Sleep with earplugs.

review.positive: There are some things which you can find only in five stars hotels. Cozy and clean apartaments moreover very polite host.

response: Thank You for your opinion. We are very hapy to create our apartments as a specials pleaces with good atmosphere and high quality service. To the next time in Sapphire Time.

review.positive: There are all what you need for comfortable living for few days in this apartment. Quite and cozy. It is so easily to communicate with the owner of the apartment.
Very fancy looking apartment, fully equipped kitchen, very friendly owner, fast wifi, excellent value for money

This apartment was the cleanest one I have seen  during our long trip and our many stays in different places. It has all appliances that are needed for even longer stay and stay with family.
We were traveling with one year old kid and owner prepared small bed for him and special baby high chair. there were also fruits and water available as compliment. Owner was very friendly, nice and super helpful. 
There was good wi-fi and all necessary instructions in the apartment and map of the city for our convenience.
In general apartment is in very good shape - it is visible that owner takes good care of it.
Parking was available outside in courtyard or there was also valet parking (which we have not used).
It was very quite area, so we were not disturbed by noise over the night even with open windows being on the first floor. Windows were protected with nets, so insects could not get inside from outside.
This is great apartment for short or long stay for couple (ideal) or small family (which is ok to have baby in the same room during the night).
review.negative:
If you would like to reach city center it is quite a distance - about 1 hour walking, but can be much faster by public tr. or car :)
We would prefer bigger space for longer stay as small child needs its own space to get his sleep, without parents being around and making noise :) But it was our wrong choice of space.
Bathroom could be bigger, but it is super clean and very nicely organised, so this was not disturbing us much.

response:
Thank you for your opinion. We were glad to host you in our apartment.
We invite you to our second apartment Double Sapphire time. There are two rooms  and more space. 
Best Regards
